title: Who Was Sylvia?
description: 1939, Barnard Castle, Durham.Sylvia Coryn is the apple of her younger sister Kit’s eye. Full of warmth and infectious laughter, Sylvia’s Hollywood starlet good looks charm even the coldest of hearts.On the brink of World War Two, Sylvia disappears without a trace, leaving Kit confused and alone. Kit always knew that her glamorous sister was meant for bigger and better things, but why would she leave without saying goodbye?Her parents refuse to talk about what happened, but Kit desperately seeks to know why Sylvia left and traces her big sister to the bombed-out streets of war-torn London.Her frantic search provides nothing but fragmented pieces of the puzzle she so desperately wants to solve.The last place her sister was seen is now reduced to rubble. Kit’s world begins to close in on her and she fears that she is losing her sister all over again before she has found her.But when she does find the answers she seeks, they will turn her life upside down. Will Kit ever recover from her beloved sister’s betrayal?
author: Judy Gardiner
